DivaPack:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
DivaPack:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

DivaPack:Reprise.NAME: Reprise
DivaPack:Reprise.DESCRIPTION: Set ALL Allies' dumbjokedivamod:Rhythm to 0 next turn.

DivaPack:Counterpoint.NAME: Counterpoint
DivaPack:Counterpoint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If played by a class other than The Diva, also apply !M! dumbjokedivamod:Captivation.

DivaPack:Homophony.NAME: Homophony
DivaPack:Homophony.DESCRIPTION: Can only be the first card you play. NL End your turn. ALL Allies player their next card twice.
DivaPack:Homophony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be the first card you play. NL End your turn. ALL Allies player their next 2 cards twice.

DivaPack:SkippedBeats.NAME: Skipped Beats
DivaPack:SkippedBeats.DESCRIPTION: Card draw is distributed among allies based on left-over energy each turn.
DivaPack:SkippedBeats.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Card draw is distributed among allies based on left-over energy each turn + !M!.

DivaPack:Po.NAME: You Shouldn't Be Seeing This Either.
DivaPack:Po.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 dumbjokedivamod:Rhythm. NL Draw 1 Card.

DivaPack:PoPiPo.NAME: PoPiPo!
DivaPack:PoPiPo.DESCRIPTION: Create a Po! in ALL Allies' hands.
DivaPack:PoPiPo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a Po!+ in ALL Allies' hands.

DivaPack:Nightcore.NAME: Nightcore
DivaPack:Nightcore.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! dumbjokedivamod:Captivation to ALL enemies and !DivaPack:Tax! dumbjokedivamod:Captivation to ALL allies and yourself.
